statements: SELECT * FROM student_report ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, performance_score FROM student_report WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT student_name, engagement_rating FROM student_report WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM student_report ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT student_name, attendance_status FROM student_report WHERE engagement_rating < 5;
SELECT * FROM student_report WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT student_name, engagement_rating FROM student_report WHERE attendance_status = 'present' AND performance_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90
SELECT student_id, student_name, performance_score FROM student_report WHERE attendance_status = 'absent' ORDER BY performance_score DESC
SELECT * FROM student_report WHERE engagement_rating < 3 AND performance_score > 60
SELECT student_name, engagement_rating, attendance_status FROM student_report WHERE performance_score < 50 ORDER BY engagement_rating ASC
SELECT * FROM student_performance WHERE student_id = 12345
SELECT performance_score, performance_date FROM student_performance WHERE performance_score > 80
SELECT * FROM student_attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC
SELECT student_id, is_present FROM student_attendance WHERE is_present = TRUE
SELECT performance_date, performance_score FROM student_performance WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM student_performance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, performance_score FROM student_performance WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM student_attendance GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT sp.student_id, sp.performance_score, sa.attendance_date, sa.is_present FROM student_performance sp JOIN student_attendance sa ON sp.student_id = sa.student_id;
SELECT student_id, exam_score, homework_score, attendance_score FROM student_performance;
SELECT exam_score, student_id, attendance_score, homework_score FROM student_performance;
SELECT student_id, attendance_score, exam_score, homework_score FROM student_performance;
SELECT student_id, class_date, attendance_status FROM student_attendance;
SELECT attendance_status, class_date, student_id FROM student_attendance;
SELECT * FROM student_performance WHERE exam_score > 80 ORDER BY exam_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, attendance_score FROM student_performance WHERE attendance_score < 60;
SELECT student_id, overall_engagement_rating, participation_score FROM student_engagement ORDER BY overall_engagement_rating DESC, participation_score ASC;

SELECT student_id, exam_score, homework_score, attendance_score FROM student_performance JOIN student_attendance ON student_performance.student_id = student_attendance.student_id WHERE class_date = '2022-08-15';

SELECT sp.student_id, sa.class_date, se.feedback_score FROM student_performance sp JOIN student_attendance sa ON sp.student_id = sa.student_id JOIN student_engagement se ON sp.student_id = se.student_id WHERE se.feedback_score > 90 ORDER BY sa.class_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, date FROM students, attendance WHERE students.student_id = attendance.student_id AND attendance.status = 'Present';
SELECT student_name, engagement_score FROM students, engagement WHERE students.student_id = engagement.student_id AND engagement.engagement_score >= 80;
SELECT student_name, report_content FROM students, reports WHERE students.student_id = reports.student_id AND reports.report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade > 90
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students ORDER BY student_grade DESC
SELECT student_name, date, status FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id
SELECT student_name, engagement_score FROM students JOIN engagement ON students.student_id = engagement.student_id WHERE engagement_score > 80
SELECT student_name, report_content FROM students JOIN reports ON students.student_id = reports.student_id WHERE report_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT class_name, class_teacher FROM classes WHERE class_teacher = 'John Smith';
SELECT student_name, class_name, date FROM students INNER JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_content FROM reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT class_name, class_teacher FROM classes WHERE class_teacher = 'Mr. Smith';
SELECT student_name, class_name, engagement_score FROM students JOIN engagement ON students.student_id = engagement.student_id WHERE engagement_score < 70;
SELECT student_name, class_name, report_date FROM students JOIN reports ON students.student_id = reports.student_id WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
